name: Keep it alive: A love story
name_original: Keep it alive: A love story
description:
After a grand misunderstanding our hero "i" is called to fix things up. Help "i" catch up with "t" and keep their relationship alive!

PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN to avoid cropping

Controls:
AD - Move
Spacebar - Jump

Credits:

Art & Animation: Lydia Papacostantinou
Programming & Level design: Dimitris Ladias
Audio Design & Music: John Kyritsis
